Name: Physical Education
Subject: ['homework and study tips', 'education', 'teaching and classroom resources', 'studying business']
Description: Young students need to learn the basics about how their bodies grow and work. They also need to learn about how to stay safe when crossing a street. The Summit PE K-2 program is designed to engage your student in activities that teach them how to live a healthy and safe life. Each lesson provides instructions and a material list for completing the acitivites
